li.p: This API retrieves all records from the logged notifications for the given UserId which has been passed as an argument for UserId field, if present.
This API retrieves all records from the logged notifications for the given PushNotificationId which has been passed as an argument for PushNotificationId field, if present.
This API retrieves all records from the logged notifications matching the combination of UserId and PushNotificationId fields passed as an argument, if present.
